description:
Conservative Party leadership candidates have received tens of thousands in donations from a funder of the UK’s main climate science denial group.  The latest register of MPs’ interests shows that James Cleverly and Tom Tugendhat each received £10,000 in August from Lord Michael Hintze, a Tory peer who is one of the few known funders […]

The post Climate Denial Funder Pumps Another £30,000 into Tory Leadership Race appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Climate Denial Funder Pumps Another £30,000 into Tory Leadership Race

description:
It’s a global climate obstruction strategy that dates back decades, researchers from six universities argue in a new study.

title: How Oil And Gas Companies Infiltrate Higher Education to Maintain Influence
